description: The Drive resource describes a single physical disk drive for a system, including links to associated Volumes.

BlockSizeBytes.description: The size of the smallest addressible unit (Block) of this drive in bytes

CapableSpeedGbs.description: The speed which this drive can communicate to a storage controller in ideal conditions in Gigabits per second

CapacityBytes.description: The size in bytes of this Drive

FailurePredicted.description: Is this drive currently predicting a failure in the near future

enumDescriptions.None: The drive is not capable of self encryption
enumDescriptions.SelfEncryptingDrive: The drive is capable of self encryption per the Trusted Computing Group's Self Encrypting Drive Standard
enumDescriptions.Other: The drive is capable of self encryption through some other means

enumDescriptions.Unecrypted: The drive is currently not encrypted.
enumDescriptions.Unlocked: The drive is currently encrypted but the data is accessible to the user unencrypted.
enumDescriptions.Locked: The drive is currently encrypted and the data is not accessible to the user, however the system has the ability to unlock the drive automatically.
enumDescriptions.Foreign: The drive is currently encrypted, the data is not accessible to the user, and the system requires user intervention to expose the data.

enumDescriptions.None: The drive is not currently a hotspare
enumDescriptions.Global: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for all other drives in the storage system.
enumDescriptions.Chassis: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for all other drives in the chassis.
enumDescriptions.Dedicated: The drive is currently serving as a hotspare for a user defined set of drives.

enumDescriptions.ForceOff: Turn off the unit immediately (non-graceful shutdown).

Operations.description: An operation currently running on this Resource.
Operations.longDescription: This type shall describe a currently running operation on the Resource.

AssociatedTask.description: The link to the task associated with the operation, if any.
AssociatedTask.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource of type Task that represents the task associated with the operation.

OperationName.longDescription: This property shall contain a string of the name of the operation.

PercentageComplete.description: The percentage of the operation that has been completed.
PercentageComplete.longDescription: This property shall contain an interger of the percentage of the operation that has been completed.

Identifiers.description: The durable names for the drive.

items.description: Any additional identifiers for a resource.
items.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional identifiers for a resource.

DurableName.description: This indicates the world wide, persistent name of the resource.

DurableNameFormat.description: This represents the format of the DurableName property.

Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all known durable names for the associated drive.

Volumes@odata.count.description: The number of items in a collection.
Volumes@odata.count.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an integer representing the number of items in a collection.

Volumes.description: A reference to the Volumes associated with this drive.

Info.description: This indicates the location of the resource.

InfoFormat.description: This represents the format of the Info property.

enumDescriptions.BayNumber: The Info is the bay number of the Drive.
enumDescriptions.Box:Bay: The Info is the box and bay number of the Drive.
enumDescriptions.Slot: The Info is the PCIe slot of the Drive (eg: NVMe drives).

Manufacturer.description: This is the manufacturer of this drive.

MediaType.description: The type of media contained in this drive.

enumDescriptions.HDD: The drive media type is traditional magnetic platters
enumDescriptions.SSD: The drive media type is solid state or flash memory

Model.description: This is the model number for the drive.

NegotiatedSpeedGbs.description: The speed which this drive is currently communicating to the storage controller in Gigabits per second

PartNumber.description: The part number for this drive.

PhysicalLocation.longDescription: This property shall contain location information of the associated drive.

PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.description: The percentage of reads and writes that are predicted to still be available for the media

Protocol.description: The protocol this drive is using to communicate to the storage controller

RotationSpeedRPM.description: The rotation speed of this Drive in Revolutions per Minute (RPM)

enumDescriptions.PredictiveFailureAnalysis: The drive is still working but predicted to fail soon.
enumDescriptions.Hotspare: The drive is marked to be automatically rebuilt and used as a replacement for a failed drive.
enumDescriptions.InACriticalArray: The array that this drive is a part of is degraded.
enumDescriptions.InAFailedArray: The array that this drive is a part of is failed.

WriteCacheEnabled.description: An indication of whether the drive write cache is enabled.
WriteCacheEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the drive write cache is enabled.

IndicatorLED.description: The state of the indicator LED.
